Posts.EditableText: I don't know if this has been mentioned before, but I just stumbled across GitHub "gists" (https://gist.github.com/). This allows you to post code samples, etc for others to look at or download, as far as I understand it so far. It seems like we could use this for library files or even for code samples in answers to questions.
Posts.HTML: I don't know if this has been mentioned before, but I just stumbled across GitHub "gists" (https://gist.github.com/). It seems like we could use this for library files or even for code samples in answers to questions.
